TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Paridrayan, title = Paridrayan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paridrayan} }

S.FORM: Paridrayan Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtung ko Paridrayan a niyaro', 229 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 733 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 718 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, Rukai 1%, Bunun 1%, roma 1%.

Paridrayan Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtong ko Paridrayan a niyaro', 229 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 733 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 718 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, Rokai 1%, Bonon 1%, roma 1%.
